members.docComment:
/**
 * Horizontal alignment options for rendered content.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: Align

members.docComment:
/**
 * Characters used to render borders around content.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: BorderStyle

members.docComment:
/**
 * Predefined border styles matching common terminal box characters.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: borderStyles

members.docComment:
/**
 * Truncate text to a maximum width.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: clampWidth

members.docComment:
/**
 * A color string or adaptive light/dark color choice.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: ColorInput

members.docComment:
/**
 * Color support levels. The `level` property indicates the maximum color support available.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: ColorSupport

members.docComment:
/**
 * Default border style (single line).
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: defaultBorderStyle

members.docComment:
/**
 * Detect terminal color support levels.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: getColorSupport

members.docComment:
/**
 * Join blocks side-by-side, padding heights and inserting spacing columns.
 *
 * @param spacing - The spacing between blocks.
 *
 * @param blocks - The blocks to join.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: joinHorizontal

members.docComment:
/**
 * Join blocks side-by-side, padding heights and inserting spacing columns.
 *
 * @param blocks - The blocks to join.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: joinHorizontal

members.docComment:
/**
 * Join blocks vertically with optional blank line spacing.
 *
 * @param spacing - The spacing between blocks.
 *
 * @param blocks - The blocks to join.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: joinVertical

members.docComment:
/**
 * Join blocks vertically with optional blank line spacing.
 *
 * @param blocks - The blocks to join.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: joinVertical

members.docComment:
/**
 * Pad every line with left/right spaces.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: padLines

members.docComment:
/**
 * Place content inside a fixed rectangle with alignment.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: place

members.docComment:
/**
 * Resolve a color input (string or adaptive light/dark) to a hex string when available.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: resolveColor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Spacing descriptor for padding or margin.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: Spacing

members.docComment:
/**
 * Fluent style builder for terminal strings.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: Style

members.docComment:
/**
 * Options used internally to represent a Style.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: StyleOptions

members.docComment:
/**
 * Compute ANSI-aware display width.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: width

members.docComment:
/**
 * Wrap text to a maximum width.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: wrapWidth
